newsitem.title: USA: BPI Packaging names new CFO.
newsitem.headline: BPI Packaging names new CFO.

text.p: BPI Packaging Technologies Inc, which makes plastic grocery bags and plastic film products, said on Friday that it has named Jack Wallace its chief financial officer.
Wallace was previously a senior partner of the public accounting firm Wallace, Savage & Danehy, P.C., in Massachusetts.
The company was not immediately available to comment on whom Wallace was replacing as CFO.
